div.p: Value Set for QICore Condition Criticality (Example)
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/CodeSystem/qicore-condition-criticality defines the following codes:

tr.td: The criticality of the condition is not specified
The condition is expected to resolve on its own
The condition is considered to be controllable
Potential loss of function or capacity
The condition may result in partial or full loss of function or capacity
The condition is considered to be life-threatening
